channel.title: Install_K8s_Harbor :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 安装Harbor私有镜像库 默认用户名：admin 默认密码：Harbor12345 必须先安装docker Harbor依赖docker-compose 安装docker-compose $ curl -L https://get.daocloud.io/docker/compose/releases/download/1.21.2/docker-compose-`uname -s`-`uname -m` > /usr/local/bin/docker-compose # 给予执行权限 $ chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose # 安装Compose命令补全工具 $ curl -L https://raw.
